name: ʄʟɨɢɦȶ օʄ ȶɦɛ քɦǟռȶօʍ
description:
A twin-stick shooter based on a psychedelic dream I had. The images are set to some of my favorite Vocaloid tracks. The background images are not owned by me, they are simply images I scraped off the web. See if you can survive to the end!

The music is from Clean Tears. You can check out his work here.

https://soundcloud.com/cleantears
